channel.title: plaidctf on Mystify
channel.description: Recent content in plaidctf on Mystify

item.title: PlaidCTF 2021: Leaky Block Cipher
item.description: PlaidCTF this year had very insane challenges. Although I have spent a lot of time working on those crypto challenges, I was only able to solve leaky block cipher. Challenge Summary This completely legitimateâ„¢ block cipher looks a bit like GCM, but my computer plumber keeps complaining about water residue. Can you help me spot the leak? The challenge has a hand-crafted AEAD scheme. We are required to go through 20 rounds of challenges, and this is how each round proceeds:

item.title: PlaidCTF 2020: A Plaid Puzzle
item.description: This challenge is solved with R3x and @mahal0z as a part of @shellphish. Thanks @piazzt and @perribus for reviewing and giving me suggestions on this write-up. Challenge Summary A Plaid Puzzle is a RPG game written in PuzzleScript. In the game, you are able to control as the player and you could move around and mess with a string. The game is available online on PuzzleScript.net. Below is a screenshot of the game:
